languages.text: {n}Вальяжно развалившись, Идира потягивает кальян, пуская озорные дымные колечки.{/n} "Шикарная купальня! В нее пять моих кают влезет, а про ржавый закуток, который зовется моей душевой, я вообще молчу. Но вы же меня позвали, не чтобы я от зависти тут померла?"

{n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вальяжно развалившись, Идира потягивает кальян, пуская озорные дымные колечки.{/n} "Шикарная купальня! В нее пять моих кают влезет, а про ржавый закуток, который зовется моей душевой, я вообще молчу. Но вы же меня позвали, не чтобы я от зависти тут померла?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tire sur son narguilé, puis fait quelques ronds de fumée en se prélassant paresseusement près de vous.{/n} « C'est une belle salle de bain que vous avez là ! Elle fait facilement cinq fois la taille de ma cabine, rien à voir avec le recoin tout rouillé qui me sert de douche. Enfin, j'imagine que vous ne m'avez pas appelée simplement pour me faire mourir de jalousie, hein ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"

Elle fait facilement cinq fois la taille de ma cabine, rien à voir avec le recoin tout rouillé qui me sert de douche. Enfin, j'imagine que vous ne m'avez pas appelée simplement pour me faire mourir de jalousie, hein ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira da una calada a su cachimba. Hace unos anillos de humo, juguetona, mientras se acomoda cerca de ti.{/n} «¡Esto está muy bien! Aquí cabe mi cabina cinco veces, por no hablar del rincón oxidado que uso como ducha. Pero no puede haberme llamado solo para darme envidia, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"

Aquí cabe mi cabina cinco veces, por no hablar del rincón oxidado que uso como ducha. Pero no puede haberme llamado solo para darme envidia, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉从烟管里吸了一口，懒洋洋地靠在旁边，调皮地吹了几个烟圈。{/n}“这地方真漂亮，能装得下五个我那样的屋子！这才叫浴室嘛，我那个到处生锈的小破棚子根本没法比。不过我敢说，你把我叫到这里来，肯定不是为了把我嫉妒死吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはフーカを吸った。近くでのんびりとくつろぎながら、無邪気に煙の輪をいくつか吹いた。{/n}「いい部屋ですね！私のキャビンが5つはここに収まりそう。それに、私がシャワーと呼んでいる、さび付いた小部屋のことは言わないで。でも、私をここでうらやましさから殺すために、ここに呼んだわけじゃないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはフーカを吸った。近くでのんびりとくつろぎながら、無邪気に煙の輪をいくつか吹いた。{/n}「いい部屋ですね！私のキャビンが5つはここに収まりそう。それに、私がシャワーと呼んでいる、さび付いた小部屋のことは言わないで。でも、私をここでうらやましさから殺すために、ここに呼んだわけじゃないでしょう？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira zieht an ihrer Wasserpfeife. Sie liegt gemächlich ganz in deiner Nähe und pustet ein paar Rauchringe in die Luft.{/n} "Schön hier! Meine Kabine würde hier mindestens fünfmal hineinpassen, und von der rostigen Nische, die sich bei mir Dusche schimpft, fange ich gar nicht erst an. Aber Ihr habt mich gewiss nicht hergerufen, damit ich vor Neid sterbe, nehme ich an?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"

languages.text: {n}İdira, nargilesinden bir nefes çekiyor. Yakınlarda tembel tembel uzanırken oyuncu bir edayla havaya birkaç duman halkası üflüyor.{/n} "Çok hoş böyle! Buraya benim kabinimden beş tane sığar. Duş dediğim o paslı köşeyi hiç söylemeyeyim zaten. Fakat beni buraya kıskançlıktan çatlamam için çağırmış olamazsın, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira takes a draw from her hookah. She playfully blows a few smoke rings as she lounges lazily nearby.{/n} "This is nice! Five of my cabins could fit in here, and don't get me started on that rusty nook I call a shower. But I'm pretty sure you didn't call me in here just so I'd die of envy, did you?"
